document.full_text: kenya's geoffrey mutai won the boston marathon on monday in an unofficial record time of 2 hours 3 minutes 2 seconds ' the fastest marathon ever run. kenya's caroline kilel won the women's race in 2:22:36.
document.title: kenya's mutai wins boston in 2:03:02
lines_and_colors: kenya's geoffrey mutai won the boston marathon on monday in an unofficial record time of 2 hours 3 minutes 2 seconds ' the fastest marathon ever run. kenya's caroline kilel won the women's race in 2:22:36.
